roleset.name: not practicing what one preaches

role.descr: what is preached but not practiced

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5.

example.name: arg1
example.text: I keep frequently seeing threads made hating on Islam , which-1 [*-1] is somewhat hypocritical and disturbing I believe in many cases .

example.name: args 0, 3
example.text: I just don't absolutely believe that he was hypocritical to the beliefs of his choosen church.
example.arg: to the beliefs of his choosen church

example.name: arg0, 1
example.text: He was hypocritical to promote environmental causes all those years and then object to wind farms barely visible in his backyard view of the ocean.
example.arg: to promote environmental causes all those years and then object to wind farms barely visible in his backyard view of the ocean

example.name: args0, 2
example.text: he was hypocritical to a man who was not exactly a paragon of free speech beliefs himself.
example.arg: to a man who was not exactly a paragon of free speech beliefs himself
